amendment.description: To provide additional funding to the Office of Minority Health to conduct a demonstration project to reduce SIDS disparity rates.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1636 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1636 proposed by Senator Harkin for Senator Daschle to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR 9/11/2003 S11321-11324; text: CR 9/11/2003 S11323-11324) To provide additional funding to the Office of Minority Health to conduct a demonstration project to reduce SIDS disparity rates.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1636 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1636 proposed by Senator Harkin for Senator Daschle to Amendment SA 1542.
